name: Chrystophoros Ellinaki
story: Theofilos Baros comes from a devout Orthodox Christian family. He is married and has two children, a boy and a girl. He has always been a reserved person with strong determination, attributes that have helped him excel in his role as a Marksman in the Greek Army. He was later recruited by the BLUFOR faction for his expertise in long-range shooting and has been serving them ever since.
